meanings.definition: A person who rises in active revolt against civil authority or government.
meanings.sent1: The insurgents gathered to protest the new law.
meanings.sent2: The insurgents launched an attack on the government building.
meanings.sent3: The insurgents tried to rebel against having to do homework.
meanings.sent4: The insurgents' defiance echoed through the streets.
meanings.sent5: The image of the insurgents waving flags was etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: A member of a group engaged in fighting against an established force or authority.
meanings.sent1: The insurgents strategized their next move in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The insurgents clashed with the army at the border.
meanings.sent3: The insurgents challenged the cafeteria for better food.
meanings.sent4: The insurgents' determination was a force to be reckoned with.
meanings.sent5: The sound of gunfire filled the air as the insurgents advanced.
